file.name: apiSkeleton.yaml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.3"
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Python Lambda API Demo
  description: API's demo'ing integration techniques

x-amazon-apigateway-request-validators:
  all:
    validateRequestBody: true
    validateRequestParameters: true
  params-only:
    validateRequestBody: false
    validateRequestParameters: true
  body-only:
    validateRequestBody: true
    validateRequestParameters: false

paths:

  /widget:
    $ref: './paths/widget/widgetPut.yaml'

  /widget/{widgetName}:
    $ref: './paths/widget/widgetWIdGetNameGet.yaml'

  /reports/filterpage:
    $ref: './paths/reports/reportsFilterPage.yaml'

  /reports/color/{color}:
    $ref: './paths/reports/reportsColor.yaml'

Error: parse: parse spec: parse path items: path "/reports/color/{color}": get: parameters: parse parameter "": at https://raw.githubusercontent.com/aws-samples/cf-sam-openapi-file-organization-demo/5adafbc9149cab95fee938c4742270da73d59d79/api/requestParameters/color.yaml:1:7: unknown parameter location ""
